name: Super Sniper: Fighter Shoot
description:
Sniper Shoot: Fighter Shoot or we should say Death Sniper: Sniper Shooting is one of the most popular sniper vs sniper and sniper vs terrorist killer games.
Pull the trigger, take out your targets and kill enemies in COUNTER SHOOTER STRIKE, an action-packed, fast and bloody fps game. The effectively way to shoot the others is by accurate head shots. Survive as long as you can to complete missions.

In Sniper Shoot: Sniper Hero, you have to fight against very dangerous and intelligent terrorists and terrible criminals who are occupied over a city petrol / gas station.
They are equipped with high quality weapons, intelligence control system and Walkie-Talkie. But you can use your weapon to kill them by your tap screen.

Just take your weapon and shoot the terrorist!

Game Features:
Easy to control (Tap to shoot)
Ultra realistic graphics
8 different world locations10 Types of Weapons
Awesome and stunning graphics
Fun and addictive game-play
Controls are more responsive

What is new:
Remove leaderboards or achievements
